{"locationId": "1135", "organizationId": "991", "name": "Rahmah Interfaith Food Pantry", "address1": "134 W. Monaville Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Lake Villa", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "60046", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://masjidrahmah.us/programs/food-pantry", "latitude": "42.3988967", "longitude": "-88.0852978", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Lake County", "languages": "Arabic, English, Hindi, Other, Spanish, Urdu", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "At
Rahmah Interfaith Food Pantry, we strive to end hunger by connecting our
neighbors with healthy food and advancing solutions that address the root
causes of hunger.   Rahmah
Interfaith Food Pantry is a Client Choice Food Pantry where RIFP allows people
seeking food assistance to choose for themselves what products they receive. We
are very space-flexible. Having a flexible structure allows RIFP to accept a
wide array of products to offer their clients, rather than trying to always
keep the same exact few things in stock. 

RIFP
resembles s small grocery store, with products arrayed on shelves, tables,
and/or in coolers/freezers, from which clients can fill boxes or bags.
  We are
a client-choice pantry where we serve on a first come first serve. Come early,
get a number, and get in line. We will take you in as soon as we can.  What'sApp
Group:  https://chat.whatsapp.com/CRxsEY34WC6BtxZcV0oZRR", "notes": "134 Monaville Rd  Lake Villa  IL 60046", "contactName": "Rahmah Interfaith Food Pantry", "contactPhone": "847-312-9776", "contactEmail": "rahmahinterfaithfoodpantry@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "Gluten Free, Ground or Pureed, Halal, Kosher, Vegan, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Other, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Friday 1:45 PM-2:45 PM", "Saturday 1:00 PM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
